00051 
00052 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_CREATOR                     0x00000001
00053 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_ARTIST                      0x00000002
00054 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_ALBUM                       0x00000004
00055 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_GENRE                       0x00000008
00056 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_ALBUMARTURI                 0x00000010
00057 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_DESCRIPTION                 0x00000020
00058 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_SEARCHABLE                  0x00000040
00059 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_CHILDCOUNT                  0x00000080
00060 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_ORIGINALTRACK               0x00000100
00061 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_ACTOR                       0x00000200
00062 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_AUTHOR                      0x00000400
00063 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_DATE                        0x00000800
00064 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_PROGRAMTITLE                0x00001000
00065 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_SERIESTITLE                 0x00002000
00066 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_EPISODE                     0x00004000
00067 
00068 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES                         0x00010000
00069 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES_DURATION                0x00020000
00070 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES_SIZE                    0x00040000
00071 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES_PROTECTION              0x00080000
00072 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES_RESOLUTION              0x00100000
00073 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES_BITRATE                 0x00200000
00074 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES_BITSPERSAMPLE           0x00400000
00075 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES_NRAUDIOCHANNELS         0x00800000
00076 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_RES_SAMPLEFREQUENCY         0x01000000

00078 #define PLT_FILTER_MASK_TOC                         0x02000000

00113 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 |   PLT_Didl
00115 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00121 class PLT_Didl
00122 {
00123 public:
00124     static NPT_Result  ToDidl(PLT_MediaObject& object, 
00125                               NPT_String       filter, 
00126                               NPT_String&      didl);
00127     static NPT_Result  FromDidl(const char* didl, 
00128                                 PLT_MediaObjectListReference& objects);
00129     static void        AppendXmlEscape(NPT_String& out, const char* in);
00130     static void        AppendXmlUnEscape(NPT_String& out, const char* in);
00131     static NPT_Result  ParseTimeStamp(const NPT_String& timestamp, NPT_UInt32& seconds);
00132     static NPT_String  FormatTimeStamp(NPT_UInt32 seconds);
00133     static NPT_Result  ParseTimeStamp(const NPT_String& in, NPT_TimeStamp& timestamp) {
00134         NPT_UInt32 seconds;
00135         NPT_Result res = ParseTimeStamp(in, seconds);
00136         timestamp = NPT_TimeStamp((double)seconds);
00137         return res;
00138     }
00139 
00140     static NPT_UInt32  ConvertFilterToMask(NPT_String filter);
00141 };
